title: About Jordan Ventures
content:
Founded in 2022, Jordan Ventures is dedicated to exploring a wide range of technology-enabled ventures.  

Pete Jordan, President and Founder, was the founder and CEO of Knowledge Matters Inc., the leading supplier or business and personal financial simulations for the education market.  During his 25 years of running Knowledge Matters, the company educated over 10 million students and serveded over half the high schools in the U.S. as clients.
